name: tunnelforge-desktop
description: TunnelForge Desktop App - Cross-platform terminal sharing (Windows, Linux, macOS)
author: TunnelForge Team

scripts.build:all: npm run build:windows && npm run build:linux && npm run build:macos
scripts.setup:windows: npm run setup && rustup target add x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.setup:linux: npm run setup && rustup target add x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.setup:all: npm run setup && rustup target add x86_64-pc-windows-msvc x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu aarch64-pc-windows-msvc aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu
